item.title: Interactive 3D plot
item.description: Interactive 3D plot created using plotly: library(plotly) mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 0)] <- 'Automatic' mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 1)] <- 'Manual' mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am) p <- plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~hp, z = ~qsec, color = ~am, colors = c('#BF382A', '#0C4B8E')) %>% add_markers() %>% layout(scene = list(xaxis = list(title = 'Weight'), yaxis = list(title = 'Gross horsepower'), zaxis = list(title = '1/4 mile time'))) p {"

item.title: Netlify blog workflow
item.description: R package blogdown과 Netlify를 이용한 블로그 개설/관리 과정을 여기에 기록해 둠 How to create a blog using blogdown and Netlify Create a new repository: https://github.com/junglee0713/netlify Clone the repository, e.g. cd /Users/leej39/Dropbox/GitHub git clone git@github.com:junglee0713/netlify.git (optional) Create an R project, say /Users/leej39/Dropbox/GitHub/netlify/netlify.Rproj. (do only once) Open RStudio and install necessary packages, following instruction in https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/installation.html install.packages("blogdown") blogdown::install_hugo() Make sure that /Users/leej39/Dropbox/GitHub/netlify does not include files other than LICENSE, the RStudio project file (*.
